descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see....2x2 squares
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...remains the same as the input.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...copy the input and add a green rectangle 2 pixels wide and as many rows high as there are colors in the square below each square.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...add four green block below of first 4 block and add 6 green block in below of orange block
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... add green color of particular block

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...2x2 blocks of different colors on a black background
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same as the input grid size.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...add a 2x2 green block below each colored block. If the colored block includes yellow and light blue add a 2x3 green block below the colored block. If the colored block includes just yellow add a 2x4 below the colored block.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...2x2 squares made of varying colored blocks placed in a black background.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same as the input.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...add green 2x2 squares directly below the existing colored squares, like a mirror image but in green. However, if the existing square has yellow in it, then you need to make the green square 2x3 (2Wx3H) instead of 2x2.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...squares grid
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...interesting on change rectangle
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...solved the task description
